oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Modeling VP operation: the Diwali festival problem
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JOSHI, RUSHIKESH K
RAJAA, SUBASH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: synchronization
computer science
computational complexity
problem solving
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new higher-level synchronization problem called Diwali Festival Problem (DFP) is presented. The problem captures the requirements for implementing the VP operation for semaphores outside the operating system kernel in presence of P and V operations, and shared variables with atomic reads and writes.
